Package org.gearman

Interface Summary
Interface Description
GearmanClient A GearmanCliet submits GearmanJobs and GearmanBackgroundJobs to gearman job servers
GearmanClient.GearmanSubmitHandler  
GearmanFunction A GearmanFunction provides the interface to creates function that can be executed by the GearmanWorker.
GearmanJob.JobStatusCallbackHandler  
GearmanJobServerPool  
GearmanJobStatus  
GearmanJobStatus.StatusResult  
GearmanLostConnectionPolicy Specifies what to do when a job server unexpectedly disconnects or a service cannot connect to a job server.
GearmanServer  
GearmanService  
GearmanWorker A Gearman Worker is responsible for executing jobs it receives from the Job Server.

Class Description
Gearman A Gearman object defines a gearman systems and creates gearman services.

GearmanJobResult  
GearmanLostConnectionPolicy.Action A class who's objects represent an action the gearman service should take when a job server disconnects.
